issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw:
I would like to clarify that this issue is related to network configuration problems and will be resolved for the finals. The tf world frame is not available when the IHMC controller cannot communicate to a remote computer, but we will make sure this works during the finals.

The pose of the robot in the world frame is estimated by the IHMC controller, and this will be available during the finals. I believe the tf world frame is merely the first thing that breaks when you try to control the robot without a misconfigured network. So please don't worry about the tf world frame. This is a network issue.
